channel.title: Server mage hits over powered?
channel.description: The server seems fine, combat is pretty good, it's a 317 PI, but I can sit there in full melee gear (-19 mage bonus) and can mage the other person hitting 40s, but in mage gear, I just about always splash?

item.title: Server mage hits over powered?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

could be that mage bonuses are added on to hit possibility oppositely or something? Lol i’m not sure just a wild guess

Read full topic
